price: Međutim, samo je Allah zaštitnik vaš i On je najbolji pomagač.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
